original_text: They will fall by the edge of the sword and be led captive among all nations, and Jerusalem will be trampled underfoot by the Gentiles, until the times of the Gentiles are fulfilled.
korean_text: 그들이 칼날에 죽임을 당하며 모든 이방에 사로잡혀 가겠고 예루살렘은 이방인의 때가 차기까지 이방인들에게 밟히리라

sentences.original_text: They will fall by the edge of the sword
and be led captive among all nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 민족 가운데 사로잡혀 끌려갈 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and Jerusalem will be trampled underfoot by the Gentiles
until the times of the Gentiles are fulfilled
